app.name: ChillBeats
app.slogan: ChillBeats is your ultimate companion for unwinding and discovering the perfect soundtrack for any moment
app.desc: Your serene escape into the world of lo-fi music. Dive into a tranquil oasis of mellow melodies and laid-back rhythms curated to soothe your soul. With seamless streaming and a sleek interface, ChillBeats is your ultimate companion for unwinding and discovering the perfect soundtrack for any moment.
